Package pentago

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Piece
    Determines a piece.
    Rotation
    Rotation class that simulates a rotation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AntiClockwiseRotation
    Anti-clockwise rotation simulator class.
    BlackPiece
    Determines a black piece.
    Block
    A block in pentago game
    Board
    Board class to manage board of pentago game.
    Cell
    Determines a cell in the othello game board
    ClockwiseRotation
    Anti-clockwise rotation simulator class.
    ComputerPlayer
    Determines a semi-intelligent computer player that can choose its next move and rotation based on Minimax decision rule.
    HumanPlayer
    Determines a simple human player
    MoveStringConverter
    Utility class for converting move and rotation string to numbers and indexes and vice versa.
    Pentago
    The pentago game class that performs the pentago game.
    Player
    A pentago player
    RedPiece
    Determines a red piece.
